page.title: 14SPORTS IN LANGHOLM
page.content: THE {SPORTS CENTRE }IS OWNED BY THE { {EDINBURGH WOOLLEN MILL. }IT IS A PRIVATE CLUB BUT IS OPEN TO PEOPLE OF LANGHOLM AND DISTRICT ON PAYMENT OF AN ANNUAL SUBSCRIPTION.IN THE SPORTS CENTRE THERE IS A {SWIMMING POOL, TWO {SQUASH COURTS, }AND A {TENNIS COURT.} THERE ARE ALSO {SUNBEDS ,TABLE {TENNIS,SAUNA,}AND A SMALL GYMNASIUM. {RUNNING }AND{JOGGING}IN AND AROUND LANGHOLM IS POPULAR.THERE IS AN ANNUAL {DOCTORS' RUN},WITH ABOUT THREE TO FOUR HUNDRED COMPETITORS.MOST OF THE LANGHOLM DOCTORS TAKE PART. THERE ARE{TWO BOWLING GREENS}AND A {9_HOLE GOLF COURSE}ON WHITA HILL. THERE IS A {BADMINTON }CLUB AND SOME PEOPLE TAKE PART IN{ARCHERY. WE CONDUCTED A SURVEY ON SPORT AND ASKED 50 PEOPLE.{SWIMMING}WAS MOST POPULAR FOLLOWED BY RUNNING AND BOWLS.
